abilities.name: Mist Coil
abilities.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: Aphotic Shield
abilities.description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

abilities.name: Curse of Avernus
abilities.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.

abilities.name: Borrowed Time
abilities.description: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Borrowed Time can be activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, a percentage of all damage taken by allied Heroes in a radius will be redirected to Abaddon.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
abilities.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing.A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. This timer is visible to enemies.You can deny yourself with this skill.Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.Once thrown, Unstable Concoction stops brewing.

abilities.name: Greevil's Greed
abilities.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield [3, 4, 5, 6] times their normal gold.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
abilities.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction Throw
abilities.description: Throw it before it blows up!

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
abilities.notes: Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300.Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.
abilities.notes: Doesn't affect Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.description: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
abilities.notes: Extra damage is its own instance of damage.Only works against heroes and creeps.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000.  The freeze area along the path is 275.Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.The instant kill doesn't work on illusions.The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain.The Frostbitten debuff cannot be purged.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases frostbite duration.

abilities.name: Release
abilities.description: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
abilities.notes: Mana Burn is blocked by spell immunity.You can lifeleech the damage dealt by this skill with a Lifesteal aura.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
abilities.notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
abilities.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
abilities.notes: The stun passes through spell immunity.Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.

abilities.name: Flux
abilities.description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

abilities.name: Spark Wraith
abilities.description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and purging the unit.

abilities.name: Tempest Double
abilities.description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except items that drop on death. The duplicate has seperate item and ability cooldowns.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.notes: Affects units with spell immunity.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
abilities.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases cooldown, increases kill threshold, and increases bonus movement speed duration.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.
abilities.notes: Enfeeble cannot be purged.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
abilities.notes: Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself.Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred.In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage per second, mana drain, and duration. If an enemy tries to attack Bane while he is channeling Fiend's Grip, they will instantly have Bane's current level of Nightmare inflicted upon them.

abilities.name: Nightmare End
abilities.description: Ends all ongoing Nightmares.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.
abilities.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

abilities.name: Flamebreak
abilities.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, briefly stunning, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Firefly
abilities.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.
abilities.notes: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.The trail persists through Batrider's death.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.Disable works on Spell Immune units.Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 400 range. The secondary target is tethered to the first. Also causes Flaming Lasso to deal 100 damage per second.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.
abilities.notes: This ability hits Spell Immune units.This ability destroys trees.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild: Hawk
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild: Boar
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The stun will hit Spell Immune units. The damage will not.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Reduces cooldown, and increases cast range.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.
abilities.notes: Bloodrage can be cast on enemy and allied units, as well as Bloodseeker himself.Only amplifies for half values when the damage dealer and the receiver are over 2200 range apart.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3.0 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
abilities.notes: Total time is a 2.6 second delay plus a 0.4 second cast time.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.
abilities.notes: Not triggered by Illusions.Max movement speed and attack damage bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below 25%.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.
abilities.notes: This spell interrupts channeling abilities.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
abilities.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.
abilities.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died.Track's effect is only visible to allies.The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold.Bonus gold is reliable gold.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

abilities.name: Drunken Haze
abilities.description: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.
abilities.notes: Drunken Haze cannot be disjointed.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
abilities.notes: The guaranteed critical attack and guaranteed dodge chance are on separate timers.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.The Fire Element has phased movement.When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Earth gains Thunder Clap, Storm gains Drunken Haze and Fire gains Drunken Brawler.

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range.

abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
abilities.notes: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
abilities.notes: Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.Items will not trigger Warpath.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
abilities.notes: If the target is killed within 2 seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.description: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40.0 seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for 6.0 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
abilities.notes: Has a fade time of 2 seconds.Also affects Spiderling and Spiderites.If free movement is disabled, you will destroy nearby trees.

abilities.name: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
abilities.notes: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
abilities.notes: Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.Insatiable hunger can be removed by purge effects.

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
abilities.notes: Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.description: Centaur counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.
abilities.notes: Return triggers when the attack hits.Return deals damage to towers.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Doesn't affect Spell Immune units.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
abilities.notes: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.description: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.
abilities.notes: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.description: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage and reduce the target's armor by 5 for 8 seconds.
abilities.notes: The armor reduction debuff is applied before the damage occurs, similar to Desolator.Illusions can apply the armor reduction debuff, however it does not stack.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal full damage, but take double damage.
abilities.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

abilities.name: Test of Faith
abilities.description: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

abilities.name: Test of Faith
abilities.description: Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.
abilities.notes: You may only cast this ability on Ancient Creeps with Aghanim's Scepter.When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.The health of creeps that are currently persuaded will not be increased further if more levels are added to the skill.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Holy Persuasion can target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Heals Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

abilities.name: Searing Arrows
abilities.description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
abilities.notes: Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.
abilities.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells or items upon activation.Has a fadetime of 0.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.
abilities.notes: If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
abilities.notes: Deals damage every 0.7 seconds.Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.Total damage: 320/640/960/1280

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
abilities.notes: Cogs can shock invisible units.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.Hookshot's pull and stun pierce magic immunity. The damage does not.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
abilities.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.
abilities.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses.The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 10 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second).Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 100 explosions.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage and slow.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
abilities.notes: This ability interrupts channeling.Pulls units over 0.5 seconds before dealing damage.Doesn't pull invulnerable units.Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
abilities.notes: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals.Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.
abilities.notes: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.description: Raises a wall of warping light that damages and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones.Creates a wall 1000 units long, perpendicular to the line between Dark Seer and the target point.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases the damage dealt by illusions.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, gradually slowing movement, and causing damage over time.LEVEL 1 - Slows the target by 33% for 3 seconds.LEVEL 2 - Slows the target by 33% for 2 seconds, then by 66% for 1 second.LEVEL 3 - Slows the target by 33%, 66%, and 100%, for 1 second each.LEVEL 4 - Slows the target by 33% for 1 second, then 66% for 1 second, then stuns for 1 second.
abilities.notes: The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
abilities.notes: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
abilities.notes: Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps.If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they will take multiple instances of damage.

abilities.name: Weave
abilities.description: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases radius and armor per second.

abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
abilities.notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
abilities.notes: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 14.0 + [1.0, 2.5, 4.0, 5.5]% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by [5, 10, 15, 20]%.
abilities.notes: Cannot cast multiple on same target.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.
abilities.notes: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
abilities.notes: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
abilities.notes: Spell Immune units can travel through the field.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Mutes items and increases duration.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
abilities.notes: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit.Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units.If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.

abilities.name: Scorched Earth
abilities.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.
abilities.notes: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.

abilities.name: Infernal Blade
abilities.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.3 seconds and applies a 4.0 second burn that deals [25, 30, 35, 40] + [1.25, 2.5, 3.75, 5.0]% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
abilities.notes: Interrupts channeling abilities.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description: Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases Doom's duration, and will suspend its duration while the affected unit is within 900 range. Also causes it to remove positive buffs from the target when cast, and break most passive abilities while active.

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
abilities.notes: Affects mechanical units.Hits units up to 900 away.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 300 radius, with Corrosive Breath added to the primary target.LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the primary target.
abilities.notes: Corrosive Breath poison damage is lethal.Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% damage in a 150/225/300 radius. Splash damage does not affect buildings.Frost Breath stacks with Unique Attack Modifiers.Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Dragon Knight was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7.0 seconds on creeps.Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
abilities.notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

abilities.name: Precision Aura
abilities.description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Boulder Smash
abilities.description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a 200 radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also stunned. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
abilities.notes: Stun is only applied if the initial target is a Stone Remnant.Boulder Smash's cooldown is not reset if it fails to knock back a unit or Remnant.

abilities.name: Rolling Boulder
abilities.description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will have their movement speed slowed.
abilities.notes: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.The boulder has a radius of 150.

abilities.name: Geomagnetic Grip
abilities.description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced, and take damage if the gripped target is a Stone Remnant.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.Can pull allied heroes with Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Geomagnetic Grip to pull allied heroes.

abilities.name: Stone Remnant
abilities.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stones Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.

abilities.name: Enchant Remnant
abilities.description: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by silence or slows as a result of Geomagnetic Grip or Rolling Boulder, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
abilities.notes: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
abilities.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.
abilities.notes: Will not damage ethereal units, such as those in Ghost Form.Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.

abilities.name: Echo Stomp
abilities.description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

abilities.name: Astral Spirit
abilities.description: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abilities.name: Natural Order
abilities.description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Return Astral Spirit
abilities.description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

abilities.name: Earth Splitter
abilities.description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases slow duration, and units pulled in by Earth Splitter are also disarmed.

abilities.name: Searing Chains
abilities.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
abilities.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.Interrupts channeling spells.

abilities.name: Sleight of Fist
abilities.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
abilities.notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds.Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.

abilities.name: Flame Guard
abilities.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
abilities.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

abilities.name: Activate Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.

abilities.name: Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges.  Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
abilities.notes: Starts with 3 charges (maximum).Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
abilities.notes: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed.The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.
abilities.notes: Illusions can be converted.

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.
abilities.notes: Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.Can heal units with spell immunity.

abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The damage is capped at 1750 distance.Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases attack range, and cast range of Impetus.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
abilities.notes: Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
abilities.notes: Damage goes through spell immunity.This ability destroys trees in its area.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Disables enemies through spell immunity.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2.0 seconds.
abilities.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for [6.0, 8.0, 10.0, 12.0] seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 8% for each cooldown frozen.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
abilities.notes: Stun works on Spell Immune units.Does not stack with Skull Basher.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.
abilities.notes: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
abilities.notes: Towers do half damage to the missile.The crosshair effect is visible to allies only.Maximum damage is reached when the missile is 1500 units away.The missile will follow and hit invisible units.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.
abilities.notes: Attack range for the primary attack is unchanged.

abilities.name: Call Down
abilities.description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The visual indicator is visible to allies only.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units within a 600 radius every 1.2 seconds.

abilities.name: Inner Vitality
abilities.description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.
abilities.notes: The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.Can be cast on Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.
abilities.notes: Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap.Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.
abilities.notes: Maximum bonus is achieved when Huskar has strictly less than 10% of his maximum HP.Bonuses are provided linearly, no bonus at 100% HP and full bonus at 10% HP.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.Slow works on Spell Immune units.Life Break cannot be disjointed.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage dealt, reduces cooldown.

abilities.name: Quas
abilities.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
abilities.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

abilities.name: Wex
abilities.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
abilities.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

abilities.name: Exort
abilities.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.
abilities.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

abilities.name: Invoke
abilities.description: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use.  Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.Invoke's cooldown is not triggered if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases cooldown and removes mana cost from Invoke. Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.

abilities.name: Cold Snap
abilities.description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of Quas. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of Quas.
abilities.notes: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than 10 after reductions.

abilities.name: Ghost Walk
abilities.description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of Wex.
abilities.notes: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of Wex. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of Quas. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in Wex.
abilities.notes: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

abilities.name: EMP
abilities.description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of Wex. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
abilities.notes: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).

abilities.name: Alacrity
abilities.description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of Wex and their damage based on the level of Exort.

abilities.name: Chaos Meteor
abilities.description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of Exort, and rolling further based on the level of Wex. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of Exort.
abilities.notes: Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every 0.5 seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over 3 seconds.The meteor moves at a speed of 300.

abilities.name: Sun Strike
abilities.description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of Exort, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
abilities.notes: Gives vision of the target area before the strike.Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.

abilities.name: Forge Spirit
abilities.description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, mana, and armor are based on the level of Exort while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of Quas. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. If both Quas and Exort are level 4 or higher, Invoker will create two spirits instead of one.
abilities.notes: Casting this abiliy will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of Quas. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas and deals damage each second based on the level of Exort.
abilities.notes: The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.

abilities.name: Deafening Blast
abilities.description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of Exort. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of Quas, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of Wex.If Quas, Wex, and Exort are all at max level, Deafening Blast becomes a non-targetable circular wave released in every direction around Invoker.

abilities.name: Tether
abilities.description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
abilities.notes: If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.

abilities.name: Break Tether
abilities.description: Break the link to the tethered unit.

abilities.name: Spirits
abilities.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
abilities.notes: Min/Max Range: 100/875.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
abilities.notes: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.

abilities.name: Relocate
abilities.description: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
abilities.notes: Enemies receive a visual indicator in the world and on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.

abilities.name: Spirits In
abilities.description: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Spirits Out
abilities.description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
abilities.notes: Can hit units up to 1000 range away.Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
abilities.notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.

abilities.name: Liquid Fire
abilities.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.Liquid Fire is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
abilities.notes: Works on both units and buildings.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
abilities.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units.You can use items during Blade Fury.Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.Deals a total of 400/525/650/775 damage.

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
abilities.notes: The healing ward can be controlled.Multiple healing wards don't stack.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: You can use items during Omnislash.Can target Spell Immune units.Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds.Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases number of slashes and decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.Damages mechanical units.

abilities.name: Mana Leak
abilities.description: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
abilities.notes: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.

abilities.name: Chakra Magic
abilities.description: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.
abilities.notes: If Keeper of the Light dies, the spell effect is interrupted.Recall will interrupt channeling spells.You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.Can be cast through the minimap, choosing the nearest friendly hero.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.
abilities.notes: Causes knockback of 250 range over 0.4 seconds, centered on the middle of the target area. Upon landing, units will destroy trees in a 150 radius.Does not interrupt channeling.

abilities.name: Spirit Form
abilities.description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Permanent Spirit Form. During daytime, grants unobstructed vision, and allows Illuminate to heal allies for the same amount as its damage values.

abilities.name: Release Illuminate
abilities.description: Release the channel early.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.Damages mechanical units.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Illuminate to heal allies for 100%% of its damage values during daytime.

abilities.name: Release Illuminate
abilities.description: Release the channel early.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
abilities.notes: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies.Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
abilities.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
abilities.notes: If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.Interrupts channeling spells.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to 50% of all incoming damage.Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.The boat has a movement speed of 650.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Drags enemies with the Ghostship towards the crash site. Enemies are still able to perform actions while being dragged.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Odds
abilities.description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.

abilities.name: Press The Attack
abilities.description: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.

abilities.name: Moment of Courage
abilities.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases Duel duration and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take damage from each other.

abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
abilities.notes: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.

abilities.name: Diabolic Edict
abilities.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals 40% more damage to towers.  Lasts 10 seconds.
abilities.notes: Damage is not reduced by damage block.The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.

abilities.name: Pulse Nova
abilities.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage per second.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.

abilities.name: Ice Armor
abilities.description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.
abilities.notes: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to [10, 10, 10] times, slowing and damaging each time it hits.  The first target is mini-stunned.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The first target will be immediately interrupted.  This stun goes through spell immunity.Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.Chain Frost has a movement speed of 850.Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.
abilities.notes: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.
abilities.notes: Does not affect Roshan.Affects Spell Immune units.The heal is independent of the damage.Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
abilities.notes: Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70% / 70% / 60% / 50% / 30% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health.  Does not work on enemy heroes.
abilities.notes: If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.

abilities.name: Control
abilities.description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
abilities.notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
abilities.notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.
abilities.notes: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
abilities.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
abilities.notes: Instantly destroys illusions.The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.Hex disables damage block.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
abilities.notes: Destroys illusions.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

abilities.name: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.description: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers 10.0% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.You can't resummon the bear if it has taken damage in the past 3 seconds.Using Hand of Midas from Spirit Bear grants the earned XP to Lone Druid.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

abilities.name: Rabid
abilities.description: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: Savage Roar
abilities.description: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.
abilities.notes: An entangled hero will not be able to move.Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: Battle Cry
abilities.description: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.

abilities.name: True Form
abilities.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: You can dodge stuns during the 2 second duration of transforming.Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Lone Druid was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

abilities.name: Druid Form
abilities.description: Return to Druid form.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

abilities.name: Moon Glaive
abilities.description: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
abilities.description: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.Beams will stop if Luna is killed.Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun.Will not hit invisible units.There is a .6 seconds gap between beams, .3 seconds with scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 2-4 wolves have Cripple, level 3-4 wolves have permanent invisibility, and level 4 wolves have 15 HP regen.
abilities.notes: If wolves are summoned during the duration of Howl, they will receive the buff until the end of its duration.Spirit Wolves have 80% magic damage resistance.Using this spell will replace currently active Spirit Wolves.
