abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Grants bonus damage to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control.

abilities.name: Feral Impulse
abilities.description: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycan and all units under his control.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing [140, 160, 180]% damage.
abilities.notes: Hex doesn't remove Lycan's movement speed.Lycan has a smaller collision size in this state.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes.Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.Ranged units cannot Cleave.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Changes Empower to be an allied hero aura. Affects ranged heroes for half values and causes them to splash around the target. Can still be cast on units, but doesn't stack.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.
abilities.notes: Doesn't affect Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
abilities.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
abilities.notes: Disable and pull work through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Split Shot
abilities.description: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.
abilities.notes: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals [11, 14, 17, 20]% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.
abilities.notes: Mystic Snake cannot be disjointed.

abilities.name: Mana Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 60.0% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.
abilities.notes: Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.

abilities.name: Stone Gaze
abilities.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.
abilities.notes: Affects Spell Immune units.Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.

abilities.name: Earthbind
abilities.description: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.
abilities.notes: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible.Does not work on Spell Immune units or Roshan.

abilities.name: Poof
abilities.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
abilities.notes: Can be cast through the minimap.Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

abilities.name: Geostrike
abilities.description: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.
abilities.notes: Slows Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Divided We Stand
abilities.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Adds an extra Meepo, and increases the shared attribute percentage.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Passively triggers Starstorm every 8 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5.0 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
abilities.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
abilities.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
abilities.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.Spell Immune allies will be affected.

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.
abilities.notes: Knocks the target back 100 - 300 units.Projectile moves at 1150 speed.

abilities.name: Morph (Agility Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
abilities.notes: Morph can be activated or deactivated while Morphling is disabled, but not while silenced.Morph can't convert stats from items.

abilities.name: Morph (Strength Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
abilities.notes: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced.Morph can't convert stats from items.

abilities.name: Hybrid
abilities.description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

abilities.name: Replicate
abilities.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing 80.0% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100% of any incoming damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.
abilities.notes: You can't target yourself with Replicate.

abilities.name: Morph Replicate
abilities.description: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.
abilities.notes: Naga Siren is invulnerable for 0.3 seconds when casting, allowing her to dodge stuns and damage.Upon casting, most effects are removed from Naga Siren.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
abilities.notes: Works on Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Rip Tide
abilities.description: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.
abilities.notes: Naga's illusions will also cast Rip Tide, but enemies in multiple areas of effect will only be hit once.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Units affected by Song of the Siren are invulnerable and cannot take damage from any source.Doesn't affect Spell Immune units.The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Song of the Siren regenerates all nearby allies for 10% of their health per second.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren End
abilities.description: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
abilities.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
abilities.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast.Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 health and deal 30-34 damage.
abilities.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage and number of bounces. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within 4 seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has 3 times as much health and damage.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
abilities.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed.Can heal Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
abilities.notes: Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.Does not affect ancient creeps.

abilities.name: Sadist
abilities.description: Necrophos gains health and mana regeneration for every unit he kills. Hero kills grant 10 times the regen bonus.
abilities.notes: Sadist is also triggered by denies.Stacks independently with itself.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have [10, 20, 30] seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.The stun goes through spell immunity, but not the damage.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage per HP missing for Level 2 and 3, decreases mana cost for Level 1, and  decreases cooldown for levels 1 and 2.  Units killed by Reaper's Scythe cannot buyback.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

abilities.name: Darkness
abilities.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Grants unobstructed vision in the night. The improved vision does not depend on using Darkness.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
abilities.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.

abilities.name: Mana Burn
abilities.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.description: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
abilities.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions.Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
abilities.notes: Casting Vendetta will cancel burrow.

abilities.name: Unburrow
abilities.description: Emerge from the burrow.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
abilities.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime.If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
abilities.notes: When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.3 seconds interval.Mana cost is increased by 20 / 40 / 60 when learning Multi Cast.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
abilities.notes: Multicast makes this spell have an area of effect (150/300/450 based on Multicast level).Multicast makes this spell have 150 additional cast range for every Multicast level.Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units with 1400 area of effect.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.
abilities.notes: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 575 area of effect to receive Bloodlust.Can affect siege units.Can be cast on Spell Immune allies.

abilities.name: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 60% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

abilities.name: Multicast
abilities.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his spells multiple times with each use, while also granting his spells greater potency:Fireblast has its cooldown decreased, its range increased, and its mana cost increased.Ignite hits enemies in an area, its range is increased, and it may be cast onto random nearby enemies when used.Bloodlust has its cooldown reduced, and may be cast on random nearby allies when used.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.description: Creates a divine barrier around a target unit which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.
abilities.notes: Repel acts the same as other sources of spell immuniy, except it can be purged.

abilities.name: Degen Aura
abilities.description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
abilities.notes: Does not affect Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
abilities.notes: Affects allies with spell immunity.Can be purged.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases duration, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

abilities.name: Fortune's End
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, stops movement, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to 2.5 seconds. The stop duration is equal to the time spent channeling.

abilities.name: Fate's Edict
abilities.description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.

abilities.name: Purifying Flames
abilities.description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Reduces cooldown and improves cast point.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.
abilities.notes: Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals [1, 2, 3, 4] intelligence for 80.0 seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.Arcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
abilities.notes: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals [100, 175, 250, 325] damage to enemies in a 400 radius around the target.
abilities.notes: Imprisoned units are hidden and invulnerable.Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.

abilities.name: Essence Aura
abilities.description: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
abilities.notes: Other than Arcane Orb, most skills without cooldowns cannot trigger Essence Aura.

abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes 40% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Sanity's Eclipse will also cast the current level of Astral Imprisonment on affected enemy heroes.

abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 75+[25, 40, 55, 70]% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
abilities.notes: If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
abilities.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1.0 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600% damage and deals 20% damage.
abilities.notes: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispell debuffs.Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
abilities.notes: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.Rush movement speed is 800.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.
abilities.notes: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.

abilities.name: Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
abilities.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

abilities.name: Fire Spirits
abilities.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
abilities.notes: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
abilities.notes: Sun Ray has a width of 130 units, and a length of 1300 units.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together. Does not refresh ultimate abilities.

abilities.name: Launch Fire Spirit
abilities.description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced. Reveals the area it strikes for 1 second.

abilities.name: Stop Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Immediately cancels the dive.

abilities.name: Stop Sun Ray
abilities.description: Immediately stops the Sun Ray.

abilities.name: Toggle Movement
abilities.description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
abilities.notes: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
abilities.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

abilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
abilities.description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.Meat Hook hits invisible units.Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units.Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Reduces cooldown and increases damage.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
abilities.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.Rot hits invisible units.If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
abilities.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.
abilities.notes: Dismember will disable Spell Immune units, but not damage them.If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
abilities.notes: Damage is delayed by 0.9 seconds.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
abilities.notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.Doesn't slow allied units.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.
abilities.notes: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.Nether Ward can be decrepified.Nether Ward has 4 HP. Heroes attack it for 1 damage, while illusions and non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt.Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases drain per second and removes cooldown.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
abilities.notes: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
abilities.notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

abilities.name: Scream Of Pain
abilities.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.
abilities.notes: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes greater than 800 (1000 with Aether Lens).Can target Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Unstable Current
abilities.description: Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.
abilities.notes: Damage activates when the spell cast on Razor.Only activates if the caster is a hero unit.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Causes faster strikes that can damage structures as well.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.
abilities.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
abilities.notes: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
abilities.notes: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 AoE once per second.
abilities.notes: Attacks once when casted and once per second after that.Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction.When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun.The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.

abilities.name: Telekinesis Land
abilities.description: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

abilities.name: Fade Bolt
abilities.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: Null Field
abilities.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
abilities.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Cannot steal item abilities.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases cooldown, increases cast range and upgrades the spell to the Scepter level.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by your Burrowstrike and doubles its cast range.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.
abilities.notes: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals 50% damage if its timer expires.Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
abilities.notes: Units afflicted with the debuff will explode even if Sand King did not deliver the killing blow.The buff is not placed on allied units.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
abilities.notes: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.The pulses have gradually inreasing radius: 275 / 325 / 375 / 425 / 475 / 525 / 575 / 650 / 675 / 700.

abilities.name: Disruption
abilities.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

abilities.name: Soul Catcher
abilities.description: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison
abilities.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
abilities.notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison Release
abilities.description: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.

abilities.name: Demonic Purge
abilities.description: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Demonic Purge will slow Spell Immune units.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 40 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases max souls.

abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every 2 souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter).The movement and attack damage reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
abilities.notes: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
abilities.notes: Instantly destroys illusions.The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.Hex disables damage block.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage. It takes two hits to destroy a single ward.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Serpent Wards deal piercing type splash damage.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases ward damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.
abilities.notes: If an enemy hero affected by Arcane Curse is silenced, Arcane Curse will pause damage, slow and duration.Affects creeps.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.
abilities.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this effect once the caster finishes its channel.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: This skill works on invisible and Spell Immune units, but gaining spell immunity will remove its effect.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Applies the current level of Arcane Curse to all enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
abilities.notes: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
abilities.notes: Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog.Damages creeps around the impact area.Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
abilities.notes: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Reduces Cooldown and increases duration. Damage per second remains the same.

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.
abilities.notes: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.
abilities.notes: Stun works on Spell Immune units.Does not stack with Skull Basher.

abilities.name: Amplify Damage
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
abilities.notes: Gives True Sight and vision of the target.Works on Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.description: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
abilities.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage.Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark.You can't kill yourself with this skill.The pulses stop if Slark dies.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
abilities.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance.Spell Immune units cannot be leashed.Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location.Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
abilities.notes: Attributes cannot be dropped below 1.Essence Shifted stats are returned to normal on death. The stat return for Slark and for the affected hero are separate.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
abilities.notes: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the passive movement and health regeneration bonuses are lost for 2 seconds.The passive movement and health regeneration bonuses have a 0.5 second activation and deactivation delay.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 55 seconds.
abilities.notes: Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.Does not damage buildings.Provides vision in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.
abilities.notes: Works on allied creeps.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after 2 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.
abilities.notes: Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.Invisibility doesn't disjoint the projectile.Interrupts channeling spell, including on Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
abilities.notes: There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.

abilities.name: Desolate
abilities.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone.
abilities.notes: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
abilities.notes: The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre.Illusions don't get this ability.Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.

abilities.name: Reality
abilities.description: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.
abilities.notes: Haunt illusions are uncontrollable and move at 400 base movement speed.There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
abilities.notes: Spirit Breaker passes through trees, cliffs, and units.The charge indicator is visible only to allies.Spirit Breaker gains shared vision of the target.

abilities.name: Empowering Haste
abilities.description: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for 6 seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.
abilities.notes: Does not stack with Skull Basher.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Spirit Breaker appears behind the target to deliver the bash.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Causes the Greater Bash to hit an area around the initial target, decreases cooldown, and increases cast range.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
abilities.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast.Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
abilities.notes: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling.This ability will destroy trees.Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
abilities.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.
abilities.notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: God's Strength grants bonus damage to allies in a 900 radius.

abilities.name: Land Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible mine that explodes when an enemy steps near.  The explosion will deal less damage if the enemy is farther away from the mine when it explodes.  Mines explode 0.3 seconds after being triggered.  Damages buildings.
abilities.notes: Land Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.Mines are triggered by invisible units.Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.

abilities.name: Stasis Trap
abilities.description: Plant an invisible trap that stuns nearby enemy units when triggered.
abilities.notes: Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.

abilities.name: Suicide Squad, Attack!
abilities.description: Techies sacrifice themselves for the greater good, dealing massive area of effect damage.  More damage is dealt to units closer to Techies when they explode.  Techies' respawn time is reduced by 50% when killed by this ability.
abilities.notes: Using this ability counts as suicide, and does not award gold or experience to the enemy team.Techies still earn experience for kills made with this ability.This ability destroys trees.

abilities.name: Focused Detonate
abilities.description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.

abilities.name: Minefield Sign
abilities.description: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 180 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Land Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.

abilities.name: Remote Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage and cast range.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
abilities.notes: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.Refraction is visible to enemies.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 10 seconds.
abilities.notes: Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position.Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.
abilities.notes: Split damage hits invisible units.Attack effects like Unique Attack Modifiers and Bash will only be applied to the main target.Attacks against illusions will not split.

abilities.name: Trap
abilities.description: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5% every second, up to 50%.
abilities.notes: Traps last indefinitely.They have invisibility that fades in over 2 seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.

abilities.name: Reflection
abilities.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
abilities.notes: Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions.Reflections can only attack their source.

abilities.name: Conjure Image
abilities.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 900 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
abilities.notes: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Terrorblade was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.
abilities.notes: Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards buff removal.The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for 6 seconds.Kraken Shell removes most buffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
abilities.notes: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
abilities.notes: Ravage will hit invisible units.Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of 775.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

abilities.name: Timber Chain
abilities.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
abilities.notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.

abilities.name: Return Chakram
abilities.description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Grants a second Chakram.

abilities.name: Return Chakram
abilities.description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Causes Laser to refract between all visible enemy units within range.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.description: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases Heat-Seeking Missile target count.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
abilities.notes: Robots spawn at a rate of 24 per second.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
abilities.notes: Rearm works on all items except Black King Bar, Arcane Boots, Helm of the Dominator, Hand of Midas, Refresher Orb, Linken's Sphere, Pipe of Insight, and Necronomicon.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.
abilities.notes: Deals damage over a 1 second duration.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.
abilities.notes: If a unit is hit by Avalanche then Tossed, it can be hit a second time by Avalanche if it lands in the area of effect before Avalanche ends.You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Craggy Exterior
abilities.description: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers.  Enemies that attack Tiny from within 300 units have a chance of being stunned.
abilities.notes: The damage and stun occur when an attack lands.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Allows Tiny to equip a tree, increasing his attack range, damage versus buildings, and granting a cleave attack.  Improves Tossed unit damage.

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Causes the targeted unit to blend in with the forest, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining a movement speed bonus when near a tree.  If the unit moves away from a tree or the spell is cast on a unit with no nearby trees, Nature's Guise is lost.  Treant Protector can cast spells and remain invisible under Nature's Guise.
abilities.notes: If cast on a unit that isn't near a tree, it will lose the invisibility almost instantly.Nature's Guise checks in 0.75 second intervals for nearby trees, removing invisibility if none are found.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 6 times.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.
abilities.notes: Can be cast through the minimap.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.
abilities.notes: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
abilities.notes: Works on Spell Immune units, but if units gain spell immunity after the effect starts, they'll break free.Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: When Overgrowth is cast, it is also cast around Eye of the Forest to deal 175 damage per second.

abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.description: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants additional health, movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed.Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.
abilities.notes: The bash stun goes through spell immunity.Doesn't stack with Skull Basher.Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Troll Warlord was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
abilities.notes: Only available in ranged mode.Both abilities have independent cooldowns.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
abilities.notes: Only available in melee mode.Both abilities have independent cooldowns.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.description: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.
abilities.notes: Doesn't work on illusions.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 7.0 seconds.
abilities.notes: Creates an impassable barrier.

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
abilities.notes: The snowball destroys trees.The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.

abilities.name: Frozen Sigil
abilities.description: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.
abilities.notes: If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.The Sigil has unobstructed movement, has a 310 movement speed, requires 3/3/4/4 hero attacks to destroy and 12/12/16/16 creep attacks to destroy, provides 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

abilities.name: Launch Snowball
abilities.description: Launch the snowball toward the target.
abilities.notes: The snowball destroys trees.The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.description: Kicks the target unit back, damaging them and slowing their movement speed.

abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
abilities.notes: Works fully on Spell Immune units.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.Affects invisible units.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases strength steal.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
abilities.notes: Can heal Tombstone, but can't heal or damage other buildings.Does not rip from invisible units.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
abilities.notes: Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.
abilities.notes: Undying is healed when affected units die in range, regardless of who killed it.Dying illusions don't trigger the heal.Plague Aura goes through spell immunity.The minimum damage amplification and move slow from Plague Aura is 1%.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
abilities.notes: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.
abilities.notes: The bonus damage provided by the aura is based on base damage and primary attribute.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Works on Spell Immune units.Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases cooldown, allows swapping of non-hero units and causes Vengeful Spirit to spawn a Vengeance Illusion when she dies. Vengeance illusion lasts until she revives and is able to use all of your abilities (but not items).

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
abilities.notes: Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds.Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.
abilities.notes: Poison Sting damage can be lethal.Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.
abilities.notes: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.  Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
abilities.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.notes: Slow works on spell immune units.Units afflicted by Viper Strike can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
abilities.aghanim: Aghanim Upgrade: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
